# Evaluate the current seletion in our Scheme interpreter # # The interpreter you use should be set in the environment # variable TM_SCHEME_INTERPRETER
INTERPRET=${TM_SCHEME_INTERPRETER:=csi} CMD=$(basename "$INTERPRET")
# Run depending on the system are we on? if [ $CMD == "mzscheme" ] ; then
# Check mzscheme version for decimal; # command-line behavior changed between # v372 and v4.0
VER=$("$INTERPRET" -v | sed -E 's/^Welcome to MzScheme v([^ ]+).*$/\1/')
# version 4.0 or later if (echo $VER | grep -q '\.') ; then "$INTERPRET" -e "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" # version 372 or earlier else "$INTERPRET" -vm -e "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" fi elif [ $CMD == "csi" ] ; then "$INTERPRET" -q < /dev/stdin elif [ $CMD == "gosh" ] ; then "$INTERPRET" -q < /dev/stdin fi
